data.message:
Eminem is the next legend after tupac and biggie !!!!
#rapgod

replies.message: Biggie and Pac have NOTHING on eminems legacy
Joshua Wingrove  I totally agree with you!!
He already is a legend before Biggie and Pac.
He is better then 2pac
Dude ia a legend. Just a Black guy's opinion LOL 👍👍👍

Joshua Wingrove maybe because they were killed ?? If big and pac were around you know they'd be spitting fire way longer than Eminem. I thought mmlp2 was pretty good but nothing Eminem has done really compares to sslp and mmlp. And encore to recovery was floptastic
He's better than both of them
Bigger legacy than 2Pac?!! Unbelievable man. In done...
I am the biggest oldschool hip-hop fan. I love them all, but they died too young, sorry to say. And besides, they would be just like fucking Jay-Z anymore, washed up with nothing good to say.
Ok lets make it easy, tupac biggie and eminem are the 3 legends in rap history, right or not ?
Attention seeker spotted
Eminem is too up and down to say he's better than biggie or Tupac. Even Marshal Mather lp which Is my favorite doesn't compare to ready to die
I mean with after : at first biggie and pac AND THEN eminem.!!
Of course eminem is not a bigger legend than pac and biggie

Pac and Biggie are over rated AF!
And before you tell me to go and listen to them I have all their albums
Ok you G

BIGGIE AND PAC DIED TOO YOUNG! I just said that. But you Pac + Biggie dick riders just fucking block out any criticism. 99.9% of my top rappers are black, oldschool rappers. 

Nas smoked both biggie and Tupac. And get this, I fucking love Biggie and Pac. Please stop you dickriders

Xander Martinez dude your dumb. Biggie and pac were great artist but if they lived longer most likely they would go up and down. Eminem has an excuse for that he was on and off drugs your mind works differently.
Slim shady ep was one of the best albums ever put out so was his next 2 after that you know nothing about good music
Tupac is legend but lets be honest big and em are better lyricist.
I'm not here to argue. We're all entitled to our opinions. Eminem isn't even my Top favorite rapper so hop off my dick.
Joshua Wingrove dude gotta disagree nas destroyed jay z but he would never battle biggie it would be an embarrassment
True
Color will not allow that
